items.name: Big Drop Brewing
items.desc:
Sold as a pack of 12 x 330ml Units*
Forget the notion this is a beer style that has had its day. Instead, think of it as honeycomb covered in chocolate, because that’s exactly what it tastes like: rich, unctuous and an absolutely decadent treat of a beer. Store and enjoy chilled.
Easy drinking, full-flavoured but elegant. Light herbal and floral hop aromas, a hint of caramel with peppered spiciness on the palate and a touch of orange at the end. Store and enjoy chilled.
A delight for the senses, this beer delivers on all levels. Rosy floral aromas are immediate as you pour, with a light and limey citrus bite on the palate and a balanced but obvious bitterness to finish. Store and enjoy chilled.
This IPA radiates citrus fruit from the moment you pour it to the second you finish that last sip with a satisfied sigh. The bright, sharp twist of bitterness on the end makes you want to dive back in for one more. Store and enjoy chilled.

items.name: Big Drop Dark Selection (Sampler Pack)
items.desc:
Sold as a pack of 12 x 330ml Units
Forget the notion this is a beer style that has had its day. Instead, think of it as honeycomb covered in chocolate, because that’s exactly what it tastes like: rich, unctuous and an absolutely decadent treat of a beer.
This beautiful ale is malt-focused with a toasty aroma and soft grassy notes because of the light use of hops. The palate is malty with a touch of fruit and caramel. Pair this beer with something hearty like a good beef stew.
Off-Piste Hazelnut Porter (4 x Bottles)
We think this beer does exactly what it says on the label, the luxurious chocolate notes from the porter and the deliciously moreish hazelnut flavour combine to make this ale almost a chocolate bar in a glass, a genuinely delightful indulgence at any time of year.
Please note: As this product pack design is new in our range, you might receive a different labelled version of the product that shown on this page. All products delivered to you will be well within the best before date.

items.name: Double Strike
items.desc:
Sold as a pack of 12 x 330ml bottles. A tastebud-tickling Sour with a clean white grape aroma, hints of fresh white break and almost lemon curd-like sourness. A great gateway into the world of sour beers, and, with its mouthwatering properties — an excellent aperitif. Store and enjoy chilled.
INGREDIENTS
Water, barley, wheat, yeast, acidity regulators (malic acid, lactic acid, citric acid, tartaric acid), black tea, malt vinegar
HOPS
Magnum
Less than 10PPM
VEGAN

items.name: Fieldhopper
items.desc:
Sold as a pack of 12 x 330ml bottles. The earthy, honey flavours of this quintessentially English hop variety, balance a gentle bitterness with the delicate aroma of orange blossom and grapefruit. Perfect after a Sunday afternoon ramble in the countryside.
INGREDIENTS
Water, barley, wheat, hops, yeast, maltodextrin
East Kent Goldings
VEGAN

items.name: Kodama
items.desc:
A fusion of style and flavour, with a distinctive malt foundation that comes from the honey undertones of German speciality malts. The Japanese hop, Sorachi Ace, provides citrus and orange notes which are counterbalanced by gooseberry and white wine undertones derived from the Nelson Sauvin hop. Together they create a summer taste explosion! Store and enjoy chilled
INGREDIENTS
Water, barley, lactose (milk), wheat, hops, yeast. Allergens in bold.
HOPS
Sorachi, Nelson Sauvin
Less than 10PPM

items.name: Poolside
items.desc:
A classic hop fest that fuses tropical flavours to recreate the intensity of a double IPA. The fantastic blend of US hops combine to give pineapple, citrus, pine and stone fruit aromas underpinned by a pine and herby flavour - topped off with an unapologetic slap of mango - to make this the ultimate summer thirst quencher. Store and enjoy chilled
INGREDIENTS
Water, barley, lactose (milk), wheat, hops, yeast. Allergens in bold.
HOPS
Azacca. Chinook, Mosaic and Motueka
Less than 10PPM
